Name: MPI_Neighbor_allgather
Description: MPI_Neighbor_allgather is a collective representing an operation that can be used on the topologies MPI_DIST_GRAPH_CREATE, MPI_GRAPH_CREATE, and MPI_CART_CREATE.

Parameters.Name: send buffer
Parameters.Description: A pointer to the starting address of the send buffer. The send buffer is sent to each neighboring process.

Parameters.Name: send count
Parameters.Description: Number of elements sent to each neighbor.

Parameters.Name: send type
Parameters.Description: The type of one send buffer element.

Parameters.Name: receive buffer
Parameters.Description: The buffer in which store the gathered data. The buffer stores the l-th block which is received from the l-th neighbor.

Parameters.Name: receive count
Parameters.Description: Number of elements received from each neighbor.

Parameters.Name: send type
Parameters.Description: The type of one receive buffer element.

Parameters.Name: communicator
Parameters.Description: The topology communicator in which the variable all to all takes place.

Return.Description:
The error code returned from the operation.
- MPI_SUCCESS: the routine successfully completed.
